availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Colyer (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, schoolteacher.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, schoolteacher. Kentucky native. Married to Mary J. Callet Colyer. Father of Elizabeth Colyer, Charles Colyer, Willis Colyer, Dorcus Colyer, Isabella Colyer, Lewis Colyer, Samuel Colyer, and Martha M. Colyer. Schoolteacher in Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1850. Schoolteacher in Rockcastle County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Southern District, p. 158A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, City/District, p. 499.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, District 2, p. 37A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994053, Rockcastle County Births.
